term.title: coulomb integral

item.text: Integral over space of the type ∫ ψ r ∗ H ̂ ψ r ⁢ d τ where H(hat) is the hamiltonian operator containing electrostatic potential energy terms and ψ is a one-electron wavefunction.

item.alttext: ∫ ψ r ∗ H ̂ ψ r ⁢ d τ
